package.name: Custom_Login_Redirection
package.summary: Custom Login Redirection allows admin to redirect customer to custom page after login.
package.description:
Introduction:
Custom Login Redirection allows store admin to redirect customer to custom page after login.
Features:
- Upgrade Proof Module. -No Core files are override - Easy to install & configure. - Option to enable/disable - Option for custom redirection url.
Installation/Configuration:
- Disable the Cache - Just copy & paste the app folder provided in the extension zip file. - If you are already logged in during installation then try to logout & re-login. - Go to System > Configuration > Magegeeks Extensions > Redirect Login Configuration > Manage your settings here.
package.notes: Custom Login Redirection allows admin to redirect customer to custom page after login. Note: This module will not override any core files.
